fields.name: Jill
fields.health: Vaccinations up to date, spayed / neutered.
fields.story: Jill is a delight, greeting her foster with chirps and flopping down for floor snuggles. She is content to hang out on a perch and occasionally come by to say hello. She enjoys looking out the window or napping close by while you work. Not yet a lap cat, Jill prefers to sit companionably on the couch or sleep in a bed on the floor.

fields.name: Lemur
fields.health: Vaccinations up to date, spayed / neutered.
fields.story: Lemur is a very sweet and cuddly boy who is named for his large, round eyes and funny face that make him look like he is part lemur monkey! Lemur has lived most of his life outdoors as a semi-feral cat, but has since warmed up to humans and indoor living and is now looking for a human and home of his very own.

fields.name: Subject 8
fields.health: Vaccinations up to date, spayed / neutered.
fields.story: Despite his dark background, Bond is shown to be a very kind dog, as he uses his precognition abilities to help others who find themselves in danger in his visions, from rescuing a child from being hit by a falling board to assisting Anya in preventing the death of Loid Forger. He also helps Anya to retrieve her favorite pair of gloves from a fierce dog by intimidating him. However, he is also shown to be overzealous and quick to seek gratification, often resulting in him jumping the gun and actually causing the misfortunes he tries to prevent.

fields.name: Dionysus *MUST BE ADOPTED AS A BUDDY CAT*
fields.story: Dionysus likes to head butt into your hand for pats. Ear scratches make her purr loudly. When not searching for her favourite mouse toy she likes to take naps with her brothers and sisters in their fuzzy bed.

fields.name: Noelle
fields.health: Vaccinations up to date, spayed / neutered, special needs.
fields.story:
Noelle is a very special senior girl (13 years old). She spent the bulk of her life living in an outdoor colony. In her senior years, her kind caretaker brought her inside to his home. Sadly, the caretaker passed away and his cats went into ACR's care.
Noelle is initially shy but after a few days warms up and is friendly. Her favourite time of day is feeding time and she is not a picky eater. (you can hide medication in her food and she won’t even notice). Although not a cuddler or lap cat and does not like to be picked up, Noelle is a wonderful companion. She loves to purr and be around her foster mom, including at night where she sleeps on the bed, on her own cushion, beside her mom’s head. She loves to be scratched on the chin and neck and enjoys being gently brushed. Noelle is impeccable with the litter box and scratching post. Napping is also a favourite activity and she loves to switch it up using all her cushions, baskets and cardboard boxes lined with paper!

fields.name: Kiko
fields.characteristics: Friendly, Affectionate, Playful, Smart, Funny, Curious
fields.story:
This sweet little bundle of fur is the epitome of affection and curiosity. Kiko's loving nature will melt your heart as she showers you with snuggles and purrs. Her mischievous spirit and insatiable curiosity will keep you entertained for hours on end. Get ready for a playful companion who will brighten your days and fill your home with laughter and love.
 ...

fields.name: Lovey Dovey
fields.story:
It's hard to believe looking at this handsome floof, but Lovey Dovey was born on the streets. He is a shy boy, but enjoys being petted. True to his name, Lovey Dovey loves other cats and becomes fast friends with everybody. He is usually found snuggling with other kitties.
 ...
